name: Donquixote Doflamingo
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text: On Play: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and return them to the top or bottom of the deck in any order. DON!! x1 When Attacking: Trash 1 card from your hand: Place up to 1 of your opponent’s Characters with a cost of 1 or less to the bottom of the deck.

effect.text: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and return them to the top or bottom of the deck in any order.
Trash 1 card from your hand: Place up to 1 of your opponent’s Characters with a cost of 1 or less to the bottom of the deck.
